name: EDDA Cafe (Mushroomallow)
description:
"Have you ever heard a myth about cafes that turn back time?”

Follow the story of our protagonist, Mina, in her struggle to move on from the past that haunts her since these past two years. She lost someone dear to her, and blame herself for it. And now, two days before Valentine's Day, she meets Taku, a waiter who introduced her to a cafe named EDDA. Dragged by her little curiosity and her friend's compulsion, she finds out that through magic in that cafe, she was given a second chance. 

Will it save her heart? Will she move forward or stay in the past?

“And when the coffee starts to drip, the magic begins...”

EDDA Café is a visual novel made by Mushroomallow. It's a cute and heartwarming, yet unusual Valentine-theme love story for Valentine VN Jam 2021 event. 

  • Format: Visual Novel 
  • Genre: Slice of life, fantasy, romance
  • Length: 8000 words
  • Language: English
  • Platform: PC (Windows, Mac, Linux), Android

  • Story writer, Logo Designer, Mina VA: Nami
  • Editor: Clover Zero 
  • UI design, implementation and Ren’Py scripter: MadScientist (Twitter)
  • Guest Taku VA: Josh Portillo (Twitter)

Disclaimer:

EDDA Cafe is a short project for Valentine VN Jam 2021. This visual novel contains 3 parts. The first and second part have been released to the public, while the third part will be available at a later date. If you enjoy our game, please give our twitter a follow to get the notification when the game is updated!

Looking forward to your feedback!
